targets.query: SELECT mean("in_segs")  / 10 FROM "net.snmp.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("out_segs")  / 10 FROM "net.snmp.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("tcp_timeouts")  / 10 FROM "net.netstat.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("listen_overflows")  / 10 FROM "net.netstat.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("listen_drops")  / 10 FROM "net.netstat.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("tcp_req_q_full_do_cookies")  / 10 FROM "net.netstat.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("tcp_req_q_full_drop")  / 10 FROM "net.netstat.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("passive_opens")  / 10 FROM "net.snmp.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("active_opens")  / 10 FROM "net.snmp.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("tcp_ofo_queue")  / 10 FROM "net.netstat.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("tcp_ofo_drop")  / 10 FROM "net.netstat.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)

panels.title: out of order packets drop(no space)

targets.query: SELECT mean("tcp_ofo_merge")  / 10 FROM "net.netstat.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)

panels.title: out of order packets merge(received before)

targets.query: SELECT mean("tcp_dsack_recv")  / 10 FROM "net.netstat.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("tcp_dsack_ofo_recv")  / 10 FROM "net.netstat.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)

panels.title: duplicate sack recv(out of order packet)

targets.query: SELECT mean("tcp_dsack_ofo_sent")  / 10 FROM "net.netstat.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)

panels.title: duplicate sack sent(out of order data recv)

targets.query: SELECT mean("tcp_dsack_undo")  / 10 FROM "net.netstat.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)

panels.title: undo cwnd reduction(duplicate sack acked all retransmitted data)

targets.query: SELECT mean("tcp_dsack_old_sent")  / 10 FROM "net.netstat.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("delayed_acks")  / 10 FROM "net.netstat.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("delayed_ack_locked")  / 10 FROM "net.netstat.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("delayed_ack_locked")  / 10 FROM "net.netstat.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("retrans_segs")  / 10 FROM "net.snmp.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)

SELECT mean("tw_killed")  / 10 FROM "net.netstat.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("tw_recycled")  / 10 FROM "net.netstat.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)

targets.query: SELECT mean("tcp_abort_on_linger")  / 10 FROM "net.netstat.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("tcp_abort_on_memory")  / 10 FROM "net.netstat.tcp" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)

panels.title: abort on memory(out of memory. should tuning tcp_mem)

list.label: host
list.name: machine
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu.usage" WITH KEY = "host"
